name: War Charades
description:
A short project created a while ago, featuring wave based combat.

Fighting off hordes of enemies seems easy when you're invincible, but there's a problem- you must defend your cloaked friend as well! Instead of damage, you take knockback, while your companion takes both.

This was never entirely finished, but I will most likely not be adding to it, so I may as well put it up if anyone is interested.
